EmailTemplate.name: 201911_Global_BK_Channel_Newsletter_amr.201911_Global_BK_Channel_Newsletter_amr
EmailTemplate.subject: Channel Newsletter November 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
BendixKing Channel Update | November 2019 Channel Updates
Sales – You can find sales bulletins posted here <[[https://dealers.bendixking.com/Dealer-Portal/Login]]> or in your Aerospace <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_bendixking&utm_content=dealer-newsletter]]> account.
- Dealer 2019BK-06 AeroNav Navigator Sales Bulletin price reduction. - Dealer 2019BK-07 and Operator’s 2019BK_0_07 sales bulletins have been revised to reflect the added airframes and updated compatibility for the AeroCruze (KFC 230) <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocruze-230?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_bendixking&utm_content=dealer-newsletter]]> digital autopilot. - Over The Counter (OTC) sales bulletin new release 2019BK-10. - Our BendixKing catalog <[[https://dealers.bendixking.com/Dealer-Portal/Login?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_bendixking&utm_content=dealer-newsletter]]> has been revised with tier pricing updates and the new AeroFlight KI 300 panel additions.
<[[https://dealers.bendixking.com/Dealer-Portal/Home-Page]]>
Product – You can find downloads and manuals referenced below here <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/downloads-and-manuals?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_bendixking&utm_content=dealer-newsletter]]> or login to your Aerospace <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_bendixking&utm_content=dealer-newsletter]]> account.
- AeroNav – AML STC SA00343BO for AeroNav has been updated to add the KT 74 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/kt-74?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_bendixking&utm_content=dealer-newsletter]]> transponder as a compliant ADS-B Out transponder per 14 CFR 91.217. - AeroCruze 230 – AML STC 89800019-056 has been updated to include additional airframes. - AeroFlight KI 300 & KA 310 – AML document AeroFlight SA04182NY. - AeroCorder – the AeroCorder flight data recorder is now TSO’d. - AeroCruze 100 – new software version PV.40 has been released.
BendixKing AeroCruze 100 (formerly TruTrak) Reminders
- The AeroCruze 100 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocruze-100?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_bendixking&utm_content=dealer-newsletter]]> (formerly PMA Vizion) and xCruze 100 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocruze-100?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_bendixking&utm_content=dealer-newsletter]]> (formerly Vizion) autopilots can now be purchased from BendixKing for certified aircraft and for experimental aircraft, respectively. - The AeroCruze 110 (formerly Gemini) autopilot for certified aircraft will be released soon; the xCruze 110 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/xcruze-100]]> for experimental aircraft is available now. - For installation manuals, pilot guides, or drawings, please visit our website <[[https://bkx.bendixking.com/en/downloads-and-manuals/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_bendixking&utm_content=dealer-newsletter]]>. - If you are a dealer and have questions on the transition and onboarding of TruTrak products, reach out to your Area Sales Manager <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]>.
Technical & Product Support
Please share this information with the appropriate maintenance and technical support personnel at your company.
Wingman Services will no longer support the KMD 250 databases. This goes in effect January 1st 2020.
To continue to raise awareness of BendixKing’s newest products and provide proactive technical support, BendixKing will begin to conduct technical webinars. These webinars are intended for maintenance and technical support personnel who will be installing and supporting BendixKing’s new products.
Future communications on these webinars will be sent to you and will cover products such as the AeroVue Touch <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerovue-touch?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_bendixking&utm_content=dealer-newsletter]]> display, AeroCruze 230 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocruze-230?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_bendixking&utm_content=dealer-newsletter]]> autopilot, AeroFlight KI 300 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeroflight?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_bendixking&utm_content=dealer-newsletter]]> indicator, AeroNav 800/900/910 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeronav-gps-navigators?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_bendixking&utm_content=dealer-newsletter]]> GPS navigators and AeroPoint 200/300 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeropoint?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_bendixking&utm_content=dealer-newsletter]]> engine monitors.
We have also added more product images to our media gallery <[[https://bkx.bendixking.com/en/media-gallery/]]>.
Contact us <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/contact-us?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_bendixking&utm_content=dealer-newsletter]]> for technical support or visit us at www.bendixking.com <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_bendixking&utm_content=dealer-newsletter]]>.
